sub_title: Personal Assistant COO/ Assistant HR/Facility Manager
summary:
I am an out performer when it comes to administrative tasks; when others begin to drop out I only start to warm up.

My colleagues generally appreciate my accuracy, perseverance and "stop complaining and get the job done" mentality.

In my last role as COO assistant, during a stressful period, I was suddenly made responsible for the entire salary- and pension administration of the group office. I took the courses, received the certificates, started the work, and loved it!

I am not a leader. I am a supporter. I feel comfortable in an assistant to senior executive role, which is also the direction of my current objective.
